thread.title: I'm a mobile citizen!
thread.title_full: I'm a mobile citizen! - Review of citizenM New York Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: aileenhal
title: I'm a mobile citizen!
text: Super clean, unbelievable customer service... in a good way, and a funky cool designer interior. Wifi is great all over the hotel, rooftop bar, gym and more! The lobby is a great friendly lounge, the rooms are small but with the best bed I think I've ever been in, loved the windows beside the bed, the lighting and room adjustments based on your mood.... all in all, a fab experience and I'm sure I'll be back at a citizenM again! Great job!
